item.title: Sara add a quote by E.M. Forster
item.description: "... there are shadows because there are hills." -- E.M. Forster

item.title: Sara add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "I knew it then. For me and her, there wasnâ€™t any time left to think back to that summer and the beach and a boy who charmed us and disappointed us. There was only what stretched out ahead, years full of new summers and promise, with all the time in the world left to start again. My sister, who never understood most of the things I wanted her to, might have been able to understand what had happened to me in this summer of weddings and beginnings. And she was right. The first boy was always the hardest." -- Sarah Dessen
